data.eml:eml: A new species of Stamnaria (Leotiomycetes, Helotiales) from Western Siberia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Haelewaters, Danny, Filippova, Nina V., Baral, Hans-Otto (2018): A new species of Stamnaria (Leotiomycetes, Helotiales) from Western Siberia. MycoKeys 32: 49-63, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.32.23277, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.32.23277
